title: by section 2(8)(b)(i) of the Prosecution of Offences Act 1974 (No. 22 of 1974)
heading: 1. This Scheme may be cited as the Director of Public Prosecutions
text_raw:
1. This Scheme may be cited as the Director of Public Prosecutions 

Superannuation Scheme 2021. 

Commencement
text_norm: 1 scheme may cited director public prosecution superannuation scheme 2021 commencement

title: by section 2(8)(b)(i) of the Prosecution of Offences Act 1974 (No. 22 of 1974)
heading: 2. This Scheme shall be deemed to have come into operation on 8
text_raw:
2. This Scheme shall be deemed to have come into operation on 8 

November 2021. 

Definitions
text_norm: 2 scheme shall deemed come operation 8 november 2021 definition

title: by section 2(8)(b)(i) of the Prosecution of Offences Act 1974 (No. 22 of 1974)
heading: in this Scheme –
text_raw:
3. 

in this Scheme – 

“Director” means the Director of Public Prosecutions; 

“member” means, in relation to this Scheme, the person who was appointed to 
the office of Director with effect from 8 November 2021; 

“Superannuation Acts” means the Superannuation Acts 1834 to 1963 and any 
other enactment or administrative measure for the like purpose and to the like 
effect as the Superannuation Acts 1834 to 1963, and whether of general or 
limited application. 

Time of retirement
text_norm: 3 scheme - director mean director public prosecution member mean relation scheme person appointed office director effect 8 november 2021 superannuation act mean superannuation act 1834 1963 enactment administrative measure like purpose like effect superannuation act 1834 1963 whether general limited application time retirement

title: by section 2(8)(b)(i) of the Prosecution of Offences Act 1974 (No. 22 of 1974)
heading: 4. For the purposes of this Scheme and, in particular, the benefits specified
text_raw:
4. For the purposes of this Scheme and, in particular, the benefits specified 
in paragraph 5 the member of this Scheme shall retire with effect from 7 
November 2031. 

Benefits
text_norm: 4 purpose scheme particular benefit specified paragraph 5 member scheme shall retire effect 7 november 2031 benefit

title: by section 2(8)(b)(i) of the Prosecution of Offences Act 1974 (No. 22 of 1974)
heading: 5. (1) The superannuation benefits payable to, or in respect of, the member
text_raw:
5. (1) The superannuation benefits payable to, or in respect of, the member 
of this Scheme shall be those which would be payable to, or in respect of, the 
member under the Superannuation Acts if she were an established civil servant, 
appointed before 6 April 1995, with 40 years pensionable service and had 
reached normal retirement age. 

(2) The benefits payable to, or in respect of, the member of this Scheme 
arising from death in service or retirement on ill health grounds shall be those 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [770] 3 

which would be payable to, or in respect of, the member under the 
Superannuation Acts based on her service as a civil servant prior to 8 November 
2021 and her service as Director. 

(3) Where the member of this Scheme resigns from the position of Director 
prior to 7 November 2031 she will be entitled to a preserved pension and lump 
sum upon attaining the age of 60 years. 

(4) The amount of the preserved pension and lump sum referred to in 
subparagraph (3) shall be calculated as provided for in the Superannuation Acts 
based on the member’s service as a civil servant prior to 8 November 2021 and 
service as Director. 

(5) For the purpose of calculating the benefits referred to in subparagraph 
(2) and the entitlements referred to in subparagraph (3) each year of service, or 
part thereof, as Director shall be multiplied by 2.5721. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
